name: C.A.T.S a Cozy Adventure Through Space
name_original: C.A.T.S a Cozy Adventure Through Space
description:
You play as Meowy, easy going cat with a very comfortable life. Until a ghost of misery came knocking. His name is Larry and his sole purpose is to follow the lords who made him and disrupt the local population, by making their life uncomfortable and not cozy. Meowy will show Larry that he messed with the wrong cat.

INSTRUCTIONS  SPOILERS!

WASD to move in cabin

W or Spacebar - jump in dungeons

Spacebar - jump in cabin

E or Left Mouse Click - Throw yarn ball in dungeons

E or Left Mouse Click - Pick up and place items in cabin

ESC - Quits game

Throw yarn to kill ghost

Jump on top of the head of fire ghost to kill it.

There are 4 levels inspired by different cozy items you find in your cabin.
